listeningQuestion.question: What happened to the boys' tent in the middle of the night?
listeningQuestion.translation: 午夜时分男孩们的帐篷发生了什么？

content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一群男孩露营时遇到大雨的故事，重点介绍了感官动词的用法，以及表示'在...之后'的句式。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: Late in the afternoon, the boys put up their tent in the middle of a field.
As soon as this was done, they cooked a meal over an open fire.
They were all hungry and the food smelled good.
After a wonderful meal, they told stories and sang songs by the campfire.
But some time later it began to rain.
The boys felt tired so they put out the fire and crept into their tent.
Their sleeping bags were warm and comfortable, so they all slept soundly.
In the middle of the night, two boys woke up and began shouting.
The tent was full of water!
They all leapt out of their sleeping bags and hurried outside.
It was raining heavily and they found that a stream had formed in the field.
The stream wound its way across the field and then flowed right under their tent!

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 傍晚时分，孩子们在田野中央搭起了帐篷。
这件事刚刚做完，他们就在篝火上烧起了饭。
他们全都饿了，饭菜散发出阵阵香味。
他们美美地吃了一顿饭后，就围在营火旁讲起了故事，唱起了歌。
但过了一阵子，天下起雨来。
孩子们感到累了，于是他们扑灭了篝火，钻进了帐篷。
睡袋既暖和又舒服，所以，他们都睡得很香。
午夜前后，有两个孩子醒了，大声叫了起来。
原来帐篷里到处都是水！
他们全都跳出睡袋，跑到外面。
雨下得很大，他们发现地上已经形成了一条小溪。
那小溪弯弯曲曲穿过田野，然后正好从他们的帐篷底下流过去！

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.title: 感官动词的用法
content: 2. 这些动词后面通常接形容词作表语，而不是副词
3. 例如：The food smelt good（不能说smell well）
4. 这类动词表示感官感受，描述事物的特征

notes.title: 表示'在...之后'的句式
content: 1. 可以使用after + 从句来表示在某事之后
2. after + 动名词也可以表示在某动作之后
3. after + 名词表示在某时间或事件之后
4. 例如：After a wonderful meal, they told stories

notes.title: as soon as的用法
content: 3. 表示两个动作紧密相连
4. 例如：As soon as this was done, they cooked a meal

notes.context: 用于描述搭建帐篷等临时建筑物
notes.example: They put up their tent in the middle of a field.
They put out the fire and crept into their tent.

notes.context: 描述道路或河流的弯曲行进
notes.example: The stream wound its way across the field.

notes.context: 表示一天中接近晚上的时间
notes.example: Late in the afternoon, the boys put up their tent.

options: They told stories and sang songs

notes.title: 露营活动文化背景
notes.content: 露营是英语国家流行的户外活动，特别是在暑假期间。人们通过露营来亲近自然，与家人朋友共度美好时光。露营需要注意天气变化，选择合适的营地，准备必要的装备。

notes.title: 语言点拓展
notes.content: 本课中出现的动词wind有'蜿蜒'的意思，这是其引申义。wind的基本含义是'缠绕'，过去式和过去分词都是wound。类似的动词还有：bend-bent-bent（弯曲），bind-bound-bound（捆绑）等。
